name: yuta519.github.io (This website)
description: My profile site. Including not only profile, but also blogs I wrote. This web site uses newer techniques like Next.js, Typescript and TailwindCSS. I choose next stacks that will be main streams I believe.

name: Innoscouter (CRM)
shortDescription: It's a SaaS to manage open innovation.
description: SaaS to manage open innovation. In Jaapanese companise, sharing knowledge between departments is a big problem. Each departments are isolated and don't share information. So Innoscouter starts to develop this service. In this SaaS, users can search candidate companies as business partners and record activies like meetings, negociations etc. And these information are not closed one department, but are open to other departments which search same companies.

name: SalesNow DB
shortDescription: It's a SaaS to show Japanese Company info.
description: It's a SaaS to show Japanese Company info.

name: Mofmo
description: This site curates a lot of information and posts articles for pets. In Japan, 2015 is a big year for pets The trend of having cats has come. And many SNS posted a lot of information for cats and dogs. So we created this site to curate information.

name: Notion API SDK
description: This is a library to use Notion API. In this web site, there are some blogs. And I wrote these blogs with Notion. So I created this library for exporting Notion pages automatically. By using this library, it is efficient to deploy blogs from Notion to this web site

name: Zscaler Python SDK
description: This is a library to use Zsclaer Internet Access API. In my Japanese career, there are a lot of opportunities to use 3rd pary security products. One of those is Zscaler. To autmate some tasks, I created this library.

name: Zscaler Go SDK
description: This is a library to use Zsclaer Internet Access API.
